text: 1.6: Kis 19.6; 1 T 6.16; Hi 13.21; 1 Pi 2.5; 2.9; VB 5.10; 20.6Ana nza muuŋgim, nza anan Ndia Fhe Bakɨme piin ki gumgi gu mbigi ki. Nza kav, Fhe Bakɨmen rotu garim, nza za kha bigi ga suaŋv ara han ŋgɨp, nza zazera harigi gumgi gu mbigir kurkurigi. Mba Fhe Bakɨme, ana Zisasan Ndia ma. Zisas Krais, ana zazera guigira zɨ bakɨme kav, ana ŋkasŋka ki. Ne guigi guarara.
